channel.title: Pocketsphinx on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pocketsphinx on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to use multiple keywords in Pocketsphinx continuous mode
item.description: Create a dictionary file containing all the words that will be used. You can use the CMU Sphinx Pronouncing Dictionary to get the phonemes for English dictionary words. keyphrase.dic: CAT K AE T DOG D AO G FISH F IH SH Create a keyphrase list file with a threshold for each phrase. Defaults to 1. Lower thresholds increase the number of matches but might also increase the number of false alarms.
